item.title: Grow of Metropolis
item.description: Sys.setenv(RETICULATE_PYTHON = "/Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use/bin/python") reticulate::py_config() ## python: /Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use/bin/python ## libpython: /Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use/lib/libpython3.8.dylib ## pythonhome: /Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use:/Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use ## version: 3.8.12 | packaged by conda-forge | (default, Oct 12 2021, 21:21:17) [Clang 11.1.0 ] ## numpy: /Users/lrabalski1/miniforge3/envs/everyday_use/lib/python3.8/site-packages/numpy ## numpy_version: 1.21.4 ## ## NOTE: Python version was forced by RETICULATE_PYTHON import pandas as pd import numpy as np #!pip install mpu --user import mpu import geopy.distance def radius(population): METRO_CITY_POPULATION_CONSTANT = -1/1443000 MIN_METRO_CITY_RADIUS = 10 MAX_METRO_CITY_RADIUS = 100 - MIN_METRO_CITY_RADIUS return MIN_METRO_CITY_RADIUS + MAX_METRO_CITY_RADIUS * (1 - np.
